title: Need 5 committed players for serious team

embed.description: Welcome to the home of Sol Mortem Gaming

body:
Sol Mortem Gaming is a new organization in North America that would like to grow and expand. We're looking for dedicated and long term players.
We plan on practicing together and entering tournaments and leagues.
As of now I would only like applications from players over the age of 18.

My role will serve as coach, owner, and organizer; therefore, creating practice schedules, determining rosters, and paying any fees to apply to tournaments or leagues will be my responsibility.

There will be a slot where you can copy and paste your answers on the team in the "contact owner" webpage.

Thank you.

Application:
- Age:
- Time zone:
- In game name:
- Rank last season:
- Current Rank:
- OP.GG:
- Previous team experience (if yes, duration):
- Positions:
- 3 best champs in main position:
- Reason why you wanna join Sol Mortem Gaming:

replies.body:
- Age: 24 
- Time zone: EST 
- In game name: Pwnl FTW
- Rank last season: Plat 1
- Current Rank: Plat 1
- OP.GG:  http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=pwnlftw
- Previous team experience (if yes, duration):  Ive been in  a few teams but nothign serious.
- Positions: Jungle
- 3 best champs in main position: WW, J4 , Zac
- Reason why you wanna join Sol Mortem Gaming: I want to be in a serious team , to growth as a player and as team.

- Age: 20
- Time zone: EST
- In game name: EmpireEmadika
- Rank last season: S2
- Current Rank: G5
- OP.GG: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=EmpireEmadika
- Previous team experience (if yes, duration): Yes, about a month on Sin Eaters Esports
- Positions: Support
- 3 best champs in main position: Janna, Braum, Taric (Lulu, Rakan, Thresh)
- Reason why you wanna join Sol Mortem Gaming: I miss being part of a serious competitive team and think I can do it better this time around

Application:
- Age: 21
- Time zone: EST
- In game name: Dotrix
- Rank last season: G2
- Current Rank: G2
- OP.GG: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Dotrix
- Previous team experience (if yes, duration): All of season 5 on my college team, took a break for all of s6 and half of s7, and from July-present searching for online teams
- Positions: Mid>JG
- 3 best champs in main position: Viktor>Orianna>Azir
- Reason why you wanna join Sol Mortem Gaming: I prefer playing as a team, my playstyle is very teamfight oriented so I can't fully take advantage of my skills in solo queue due to the inherent lack of coordination of being matched up with random other players.
